General.Name: Trifecta Gold Ltd
General.Description: Trifecta Gold Ltd. engages in the acquisition, exploration, and evaluation of mineral properties in Canada. It primarily explores for gold and silver deposits. Its primary project is the Yuge gold project located in Nevada. Trifecta Gold Ltd. was incorporated in 2016 and is headquartered in Vancouver, Canada.
General.Address: 510 - 1100 Melville Street, Vancouver, BC, Canada, V6E 4A6

2.Name: Mr. Glenn Robert Yeadon B.Com., L.L.B., LL.B
